# AWK


  • Official Documentation | AWK (opens new window)
  • usessionbuddy - Awk Cheatsheet (opens new window)

cat cars.csv | head -2

mpg, cylinders, cubicinches, hp, weightlbs, time-to-60, year, brand 14,8,350,165,4209,12,1972, US.

# Print Columns in AWK


awk 'BEGIN {FS=","} {print $2}' < cars.csv | head -2

cylinders 8


awk 'BEGIN {FS=","} {print $2,$3,$4}' < cars.csv | head -2

cylinders cubicinches hp 8 350 165

# Arrays In AWK


awk 'BEGIN {a[1]=2;print a[1]}'

cylinders 8

awk 'BEGIN {
     for (i=0 ;i <5; i++) {
         b[i] = 1
     }
     #Loop through awk array b
     for (elem in b) {
         print elem
     }
 }'

4 0 1 2 3

# cURL


  • Official Documentation | Curl (opens new window)
  • Cheatsheet | Curl (opens new window)
Description Code
Post Data 
 
curl -d password=x http://x.com/y
Auth Data 
 curl -u user:pass -d status="Hello" http://twitter.com/statuses/update.xml
Multipart File Upload 
 
curl -v -include --form key1=value1 --form upload=@localfilename URL
multipart form 
 
curl -F person=anonymous -F secret=@file.txt http://example.com/submit.cgi
Use Curl to Check if a remote resource is available 
 
curl -o /dev/null --silent -Iw "%{http_code}" https://example.com/my.remote.tarball.gz
Last Updated: 8/11/2021, 8:27:48 PM
